website_summaries.verdict: Professional-quality set at consumer-level price point. If you seek a contemporary look and nonstick anodized aluminum, this is the one to consider from Calphalon.
pros: Handles stay cool during stove top use
cons: Dishwasher safe, but hand washing recommended

customer_reviews.title: Attempt #2: The pans came packaged well, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Attempt #2: The pans came packaged well, but there were imperfections. The instructions say don't return to the store, contact us, then goes on to tell you that if you think there is a problem, ship it to them and they'll determine if it's something they are willing to replace or fix. I'm not going to spend more money to let them decide if they are going to repair damage done at the factory. My more in depth review was rejected by Amazon so this simple one will have to do. I would buy in a store and return it to the store if you have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Redesign of lids
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon has redesigned the lids and is no longer providing the black gasket that was once in the lids. So when you wash the lids, water gets in between the glass and the metal. Calphalon now has "special instructions" on how you have to wash the lid and store it at an angle to allow the water to run out. I will not be buying this brand again unless they correct this design flaw. I have submitted a formal complaint with Calphalon.
customer_reviews.author: Mebeta

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pan
customer_reviews.text: This set is very nice to cook with, with the exception of the 2.5 quart sauce pan that is scratched. I thought it was just something on the pan, but it when I was washing it, it was obviously a scratch. Can't use it, and having trouble figuring out how to get it replaced without returning the entire set, which is why I took off one star. I will update my review after the problem has been resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in an open box, chipped rims, missing lid. WTF?
customer_reviews.text: This pan set looks like it might be good... crazy great ratings but for the damage, the missing pieces and odd circular "hump" in the middle of the all of the rims, this was not for me. If you look closely at the pictures they've posted you can see what I'm referring to. I didn't think it'd be much of an issue but with this odd hump and a very straight up and down final edge to every pan and pot, any hopes I had for sliding out food onto a plate would be challenging at best with this setup. So no... for so many reasons no. Back to Amazon you go!
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Both I figured are aluminum something that doesn't rust like iron/steel last time I checked
customer_reviews.text: I think these might actually be lower quality or fake when compared to a set used by myself last year. (TL:DR they are with the ex) The nonstick seemed to be much more fragile. Also the handles and lids are rusting. Both I figured are aluminum something that doesn't rust like iron/steel last time I checked. Confusing none the less. When its time to replace these, Ill probably go to a retail store to do so. May actually switch to allclad or something.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: My favorite set of pots and pans ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these pots and pans. I love hard anodized aluminum for it's beefy, sturdy feel and the way it cooks. $360 is A LOT of money to me. It took me 3 years to finally pull the trigger on this set (I also added the 5qt sauce pan separately for $62) and I am in love. Yes, water gets between the glass and the rim. That happens with any glass to metal connection...my crock pot lid, other pot lids. Be smart and just keep running water through it till the soap gets out and then dry it at an angle like a normal person. Sheesh.
customer_reviews.author: AdSaLo

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this purchase. Purchased August 2017 and already losing their finish ... Have never put in dishwasher or used anything but non-stick utensils . Would not recommend or buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dave Nasset

customer_reviews.title: It's still very nice and show every little wear
customer_reviews.text: I've had a set of Calphalon that are not dishwasher safe for many, many years, I purchased this new set not because my old set was worn out. It isn't. It's still very nice and show every little wear, even after 10 years of use. I simply wanted a set that was dishwasher safe. I expect the it to wear as nicely as my old as it is identical, except for having "dishwasher safe" stamped on the bottom. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Parker

customer_reviews.title: Finish Not Durable, but Warranty is Solid
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to receive this set, but after only a handful of uses and careful handling, the finish is peeling on the 10-inch skillet. Thoroughly disappointing. Too expensive to be ruined so quickly. However, I am quite pleased with the company’s customer service rep, Nico, who politely and efficiently processed my warranty claim. Unfortunately, the 10-in Pan is discontinued, but I will be receiving a 12-inch pan as a replacement. Hoping the rest of the set lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Avoid: The non stick layer started peeling off within the 1st week of use
customer_reviews.text: The nonstick layer started peeling off within the 1st week of use. This is when the care instructions were followed properly. It was used only twice or thrice at medium heat levels before it showed signs of peeling. Silicone spatulas were used, and the pan wasn't put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: the pans are very heavy duty and the finishes are quite nice and look very durable
customer_reviews.text: Slightly disapointed in the shape of the saute pans for flipping food without utensils, and also for the handles on the lids getting very hot during cooking. Otherwise, the pans are very heavy duty and the finishes are quite nice and look very durable. I have a freind who has had the same set for years and they hold up very well, which is why we bought this set. I'm hoping I get used to the odd shape of the saute pans, and I can remember to use a hot pad to take lids off, but for now I have to rate it three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Love Calphlon
customer_reviews.text: All my cookware is Calphlon. Strong, cooks evenly, easy to clean and priced reasonably.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Weir

customer_reviews.title: Non stick shavings in your food-awful pans!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage! The coating does not last and shavings of it end up in your food!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin B.

customer_reviews.title: Big pan heavily scratched after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the items included in this package have started out very well, but after less than two months, the large pan began to have major scratches on the surfaces that come into contact with food while cooking. Durability of a product is of paramount importance, and I fear that those living in my house hold have digested some of the materials that have pealed off the surface. I am shocked that this has happened so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sturdy high quality. Now will see if lasts.
customer_reviews.text: Oh my these are really nice. Very surprised how high quality and sturdy. Hopefully they last I like all the others where the coating comes off. But beautiful pots pans and lids!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pans
customer_reviews.text: I received my package on time (today) and haven't used the pans yet. Although they look great in terms of quality and style, I noticed two of the pans with deep scratch marks as shown in the picture. I'm not sure if I received a returned product or if the damages were caused during delivery.
customer_reviews.author: AMALIA MENDES

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Contemporary not worth its money.
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this set but one of the pots arrived with scratches (used?). And at this point another pot shows considerable wear in the form of scratches, even though I have been treating it very carefully. I paid a lot of money (495) for a product that does not keep its promises and feels much cheaper. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Karin Schinkmann

customer_reviews.title: Quality feel, and look.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best pot and pan set I have purchased, which in itself doesn't mean much the quality leads my to believe it might be the last set we buy. Recommend them to everyone that asks.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Coating flaking after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2 years later, inside coating is flaking off in large chunks. No metal utensils, hand washed only. For the price, assumed they would hold up better. I am really pleased with these pans. Nice and heavy. Feel very solid. We have been using them daily with no scratches but we do not not use any metal utensils and we hand wash only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short lived
customer_reviews.text: I really loved these pans for the first year after we purchased. I have always been careful and hand washed the pans and always used rubber/plastic utensils. Unfortunately after about a year, the “nonstick” aspect in the two frying pans went away and became more difficult to wash than my stainless steel pans, even with proper oil and no burnt-on food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: After the first use of the 2 1/2 quart pot, liquid was trapped between glass and metal rim. Upon looking up Calphalon’s return policy, it stated the customer is responsible for all shipping cost and proof of purchase. So, after spending $300.00+ for a set of inferior cookware, I’ll just cut my losses( which is what they are betting on) and never purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: DUDLEY

customer_reviews.title: The lid of the pot doesn't fit well.
customer_reviews.text: The lid of the pot doesn't fit well. Other people seem to have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set-worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, super high quality and durable! We shopped a lot before deciding on this simple yet super high quality set, wr are aold on calphalon!
customer_reviews.author: WMonch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. It's sturdy and well made. My only issue is you have to baby it so that it doesn't scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Harmon

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy they are to clean! They came very quick and were undamaged. Very beautiful set
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law has a set and recommended it to me. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Best set of cookware she has ever used
customer_reviews.text: My wife had her eye on these, so I bought them as a surprise. She absolutely loves them. Best set of cookware she has ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Felt like Kirkland pots from Costco
customer_reviews.text: This line does not stand up to calphalon quality. Felt like Kirkland pots from Costco, which isn't bad but is NOT typical calphalon. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Goli

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife - happy life
customer_reviews.text: Should have gotten these a long time ago. Beautiful finish. Food tastes better? Uhhhhh sure.
customer_reviews.author: Berg

customer_reviews.title: Don't even try it..
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other cookware I have this really didn't hold up. Leaking on the rivets, discolored. Trashed.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Shop

customer_reviews.title: I started with a Chefs brand fry pan and we were very disappointed. the lid wouldn't even stay on
customer_reviews.text: We have been needing to replace our old cookware for some time now. I started with a Chefs brand fry pan and we were very disappointed. the lid wouldn't even stay on. It was my wife's birthday so I decided to spring for the good stuff and replace everything. My wife loves the Calphalon and we are very happy with the quality and performance. It is well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon G.

customer_reviews.title: These pans are worth there price you pay!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grill pan first and my Husband just loved it. Then I bought the whole set! of Pots and Pans. These are the best pot and Pans I have ever had and it's worth the money. I had bought so many other's that worked for 3 times and they did not stand but a few times with out chiping!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dodson

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and worth the money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality!!!! Nice heavy duty pots and pans that hold up.Before buying this we had a couple Calphalon Contemporary pans that were given to us as a gift And we loved them.They hold up and clean up really well and easy. We love them so much we had to buy more. I would definitely recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: dennis a mayes jr

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Had a scratch on one of the pans. Very noticeable. And sad. Beautiful if wasn’t scratched
customer_reviews.author: Misty Simon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money I spent
customer_reviews.text: All non stick is coming off. Warranty return isn't worth the time or return mailing expense.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product, however one of our lids was delivered ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however one of our lids was delivered deformed, will not fit snug. Not a big deal for us,
customer_reviews.author: Mihai Lungulescu

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and they work well on top of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, easy to use and they work well on top of the stove as well as in the oven. Just what I needed to replace my aging set of pans
customer_reviews.author: M. Sangiorgi

customer_reviews.title: They warp.
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice but they seem to warp with heat so the lids no longer fit. We only hand wash them so there is no other explanation.
customer_reviews.author: Djbackpain

customer_reviews.title: Best set ever
customer_reviews.text: these are by far the best I've ever had. So easy to clean, heavy duty. Cook so evenly.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie squicciarini

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans. It was the first time I invested in a nice set and it was a great inv stment. Hey are a little heavy to lift but great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived In Perfect Shape! Cooks Perfect Food!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to order these, as there were a lot of reviews about them arriving scratched and scuffed up. I am happy to say that mine arrived in perfect shape. In addition these have made cook fun and enjoyable again as they evenly heat and are super easy to clean. After cooking with them my wife asked what took me so long to get theses! :) I would highly recommend this set and/or Calphalon products.
customer_reviews.author: Trever

customer_reviews.title: Not durable!
customer_reviews.text: After 14 months of use, all pans are wearing out. Probably not safe to use which can lead to health issues
customer_reviews.author: matteuccie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty with a beautiful finish, nice
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous cookware! Heavy duty with a beautiful finish, nice, even cooking. Quite a bit more "maintenance" than I wanted. Cannot use many of the most common dishwasher detergents so, I end up washing by hand. And you need to "season" the pots as well as the pans to keep the nonstick finish.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: It's a good set of pots and pans, they have worked well for me and it's nice to throw them in the dishwasher and not worry. My only complaint is that one my most used pots is already losing the not stick surface where the lid meets the pot.
customer_reviews.author: NotMyName

customer_reviews.title: The thing I love about these best is they can be put in ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing I love about these best is they can be put in the dishwasher. They come out perfectly and are so easy to clean that the dishwasher hardly feels necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Reshma R.

customer_reviews.title: Great pans for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love these pans. They cook food perfectly, easy to clean and are built really well. Will never go back to cheap pans.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love my set of Calphalon pots and pans, even bought the matching steamer a few weeks later.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly E. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Take your cooking to the next level
customer_reviews.text: Easy non-stick clean up, stay cool handles and glass lids. All at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: My vote is #1
customer_reviews.text: I just love my cookware! I am so happy I ordered this set. It's easy to cook with..cooks evenly and easier to clean. I wish I had purchased this the last time I needed cookware.
customer_reviews.author: P. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FUNCTIONING AND GREAT LOOKING COOKWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with both the aesthetic appearance of this cookware, as well as its functionality! I get so many compliments on them. I've now made additional purchases to add to my set!
customer_reviews.author: Cherylynn

customer_reviews.title: Made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend to those looking for cookware not made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second set of these type of pans, they look phenomenal and work very well!
customer_reviews.author: C G.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of cookware for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We've only been using them for a month now, but we love the weight and the fact that the handles stay cool when we are cooking on the stove top. Additionally, we have used the main sauce pan in the oven for a stew and it performed as well as as using our cast iron cook pot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean, handles stay cool, nice, heavy weight. Sits balanced and flat on ceramic cooktop. Just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: StanB42

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars and worth every one!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans! Heavy gauge for even heat. Every piece can be used in the oven as well. Best pans I have ever had, at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn McKinish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pots and pans
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pots and pans, the maintain the heat long after the stove top is shut off. They clean very easily as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, everything looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: After several years my trusty KitchenAid set of pans were starting to show some wear. Especially the largest skillet I used the most. Everything stuck to the bottom, so I decided to splurge on a new set of cookware. Actually, my husband insisted I buy some new pans. I'm excited about this cookware set. I've prepared several meals now, and have been pleased with the quality so far. Will be happy if this set lasts as long as my KitchenAid set has. I did have to exchange the large stock pot due to a manufacturer's defect inside the bottom Teflon coating. Amazon's exchange was an easy process.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Don't put in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.text: Great pans but DON'T put in the dishwasher! We learned the hard way and the finish I'd coming off. .
customer_reviews.author: NatC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! We have some Calphalon pans already the are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Waldrep

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The handles get so hot. They are also short handles. They are already rusting too.
customer_reviews.author: Smdl

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookware for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cookware set for the price. Nonstick surface is great and they work as great as they look. Just hope the coating lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Joe/Lily/Kristen

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift we have the regular Calphalon and we love it that is why I bought this for a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's for a gift we have the regular Calphalon and we love it that is why I bought this for a gift for daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Does not last. Be prepared to replace after 1 year even carefully following care instructions.
customer_reviews.author: L. Folsum

customer_reviews.title: A great set with a lifetime warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly have nothing negative to say... This set is durable, thick, and very good looking. The hard anodized non stick surface is amazing to cook with and cleans up with very little effort. The handles are strong and we'll designed. I am very glad we spent the extra money instead of going with the "Calphalon Simply" set. Completely worth the price difference.
customer_reviews.author: SAT211

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This set is replacing a stainless steel set I was using. If you want easy cleaning this is the way to go. Its almost spotless after rinsing with water but you must use soap to remove the film. I am loving the 10" skillet and use it the most. I didn't have one with my stainless set. I expect to get many years of use from these pans and if they wear out I can send for a replacement. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: palcafe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift which the recipient was very pleased to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We were all very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a wedding shower gift for my daughter! We were all very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Magness

customer_reviews.title: Lost the nonstick coating
customer_reviews.text: After 2 uses... We just bought these 3 weeks ago. never using metal utensils and washed with a sponge our sauce pan lost the nonstick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Love these pots!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to put them in the dishwasher. Saves a lot of time from having to hand wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good looking, reasonable set other than that
customer_reviews.text: Unbeknownst to us, this is NOT a non-stick surface that is useable with metal utensils. We destroyed one pot before understanding this. It’s a good looking, reasonable set other than that. I did try to communicate with company and have a claim number and promise to contact within in two days. So far , no word.
customer_reviews.author: Norm P.

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her new set of Calphalon. They cook great and you have know problem with food sticking to the pots or pans
customer_reviews.author: Dark Gable

customer_reviews.title: Rec'd in good condition. A couple openings in the side of ...
customer_reviews.text: Rec'd in good condition. A couple openings in the side of box. Very hard to open. Having trouble with Ebates coming thru.
customer_reviews.author: Peachykeen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: quality nice, for a big family, too large for 2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love my new cookware. have not put in dishwasher yet, but cleans up really easy. however, I still need one more pot, not a stock pot, a bit smaller
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Ciferri

customer_reviews.title: I love Calphalon
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon is great stuff. Very durable and easy to maintain. The quality is top notch. This set has everything for basic cooking tasks. Could use a medium bot for boiling pasta and a griddle but bought those as separates. Make sure to order the Calphalon utensils too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Wildman

customer_reviews.title: Don't ever buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We're so careful with our stuffs but less than one month you could see scratches! Terrible quality, don't spend your money on this!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lidia and Robert Heighway

customer_reviews.title: Finish is already coming off pots audit says it they ...
customer_reviews.text: Finish is already coming off pots audit says it they are not able to be returned... Frustrated only had since December and have not even used much! I ORDERED A REPLACEMENT PAN AND THEN THEY ALL STARTED FLACKING OFF? I CAN'T GET A RESPONSE FROM THE SELLER OR COMPANY??
customer_reviews.author: David Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: 12-inch omelette pan came with two discolorations on surface of ...
customer_reviews.text: 12-inch omelette pan came with two discolorations on surface of pan, I was told this was normal. Sadly, the spots have started to rust and of course it is past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: Not scratch resistant
customer_reviews.text: Pans are scratched 1 year in. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: kevin reiner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nonstick Cookware - MADE IN USA
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after looking at many different brands of cookware. Calphalon stands for high-quality, and best of all the pans are MADE IN USA, in Toledo, Ohio.
customer_reviews.author: Lemans Jeff

customer_reviews.title: US made, for shame...
customer_reviews.text: Came with wrong sized lids. Got 2 lids for the larger saucepan and none for the smaller saucepan. Also the stock pot rim was not level so the lids would rock annoyingly back and forth. US made, but a joke in quality control. Seemingly careless manufacturing escapes...

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely excited to receive these pots as a ...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited to receive these pots as a Christmas present this year. Behold, today is little over three weeks of ownership and the coating is already coming off. Even if it was used heavily everyday, this is totally unacceptable. Not worth 20 dollars let alone almost 200!!!! This brand has lost me as a customer for ever. Should be zero stars but Amazon is too kind.
customer_reviews.author: David Craib

customer_reviews.title: Shattered glass in box when delivered
customer_reviews.text: I Love this cookware, my first set lasted 9 years, couldn't wait to get this 12 piece set was so disappointed when I had to send it back :( Did Not have a Fragile sticker on outside and a lid was shattered and pots were scratched! So Upset :(
customer_reviews.author: wildwildwest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gift for daughters law and was so happy Calphalon is the best
customer_reviews.author: bonnie currie-noorda

customer_reviews.title: the price was very competitive and delivery excellent
customer_reviews.text: Hard to say since I have not open the box as it is a wedding gift, however, the price was very competitive and delivery excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misshapen Pots & Lids
customer_reviews.text: One of the pots was warped and the lid wouldn't fit. Was unable to return to seller and had to go through Calphalon for replacement. The process is going to take 8-10 weeks for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: C-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent transaction...the pan set is a wedding gift and I am so excited to see them open it...it won't be long!
customer_reviews.author: Polly G

customer_reviews.title: ... Art pots and pans thinking we were getting a great set. 2 of the pans are already unusable ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace our 10 year old Cuisine Art pots and pans thinking we were getting a great set. 2 of the pans are already unusable because of chipping. I know it isn't the utensil's being used since I bought the Calphalon 5 piece set and have been using those in combination with silicon ones.On top of that the handles get really hot. These are 6 months old and are essentially useless. Do not purchase these. I will not be purchasing any more Calphalon products.
customer_reviews.author: adrian fronczak

customer_reviews.title: If not for the amazing deal I got on these during the holidays
customer_reviews.text: Beyond surprised at the low quality. If not for the amazing deal I got on these during the holidays, I would 100% return them. The outer coating quickly rubbed off around the rim where the lid meets the pot, and I'm talking within the first 5 uses. This immediately made me concerned for the future of these and how short of life-span they will have. Fortunately, I dont cook often but if you cook frequently I would be very concerned. Save your money and buy their higher end stuff, or go for another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality & functionality so far, love the pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old warped set of "The Rock" cookware with these far more expensive pots and pans. So far I love these things! I've already used most of the set several times, and they're holding up well. If they hold up to my cooking load for 2 years it will have been a worthwhile investment. They heat quickly and evenly, and the non-stick works extremely well. They are larger than I expected, and I love all the set pieces! Appears to be the quality I expected from Calphalon for the price! I will update this in a couple months after more use!
customer_reviews.author: CompGuy87

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sticks to these!!!! I have been guilty of letting pans sit overnight (after a very late night of entertaining) and they clean up so well. They heat up quickly and evenly. Best set i've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: shopping gal

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The pans heat evenly and quickly. They are very non-stick but not delicate. Cooking and browning in them is excellent and you can put them in the oven up to 450. The lids fit well, and will not slide off the pot. The sizes for this set cover just about everything you will cook on stove top, but you may need a steamer insert. Only downside - the 5 qt dutch oven arrived bent so that the lid would not fit. When I contacted Amazon they refunded me the cost of a replacement which got here in a couple of days. Great customer service and support. Are they pricy? Yes. Worth it? Absolutely!
customer_reviews.author: William Cnossen

customer_reviews.title: Best cookware we have bought yet!
customer_reviews.text: Love the way the cookware heats up quickly and evenly. Really seems to be resistant to scratching, cleans easier than any of our other "non-stick" pans. Handsome cookware, we have it hanging over our stove and it looks great! Best cookware we have bought yet! Note, had to return the set ordered through an Amazon supplier as they sent us the wrong set. Ended up getting the set through Crate and Barrel cheaper and with two bonus Calphalon items with a value of over $100. Check C&B online for deal.
customer_reviews.author: DZRhinoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Heat distribution/No residual
customer_reviews.text: My family loves creamed dried beef, better known as SOS. I sometimes would get uneven consistency when making this, but with this pan, it was absolutely awesome. Everything was smooth and creamy and the pan had no residual food sticking to it. I really enjoy my new calphalon pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love the set !
customer_reviews.text: Each piece is used and works well - it’s. It the Pans .... it the Cook that’s the problem - LOL !
customer_reviews.author: Dav Mag

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good. Large size pots
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but good. Large size pots, non-stick works well, dishwasher safe. It took me a while to figure out which adjective of "Calphalon" meant "dishwasher safe". This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: ghc

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s not cheap, but great quality. Nothing is sticking, cooking is very fast. Made in USA (Toledo,OH) which is important for our family
customer_reviews.author: VladE

customer_reviews.title: Quality and non-stick
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I didn't need 15 items so this is just perfect. Water in the lids, yes but I do not see that as an issue. It is only a few drops and will evaporate. Buy It
customer_reviews.author: Tag

customer_reviews.title: Pans are great. Storing them is a hassle (need to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Pans are great. Storing them is a hassle (need to put a cloth in-between the pots to keep them scratch free. Lid storage is also a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: JCC

customer_reviews.title: Sub standard product . Taflon came off within 6 months.  Large pan didn't hold it's shape.
customer_reviews.text: Teflon coating came off with the minimal use after 6 months. Generic brands from Walmart are better than this product . Stay away !!!
customer_reviews.author: Touha Mushir

product_meta.title: Calphalon Contemporary Hard-Anodized Aluminum Nonstick Cookware Set, 12-Piece, Black
product_meta.description: Size:12-PieceFeaturing a hard-anodized exterior and nonstick interior. Calphalon Contemporary Nonstick cookware combines durability and performance with fast clean-up and easy low-fat cooking.. Heavy-gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard-anodized for durability. It also makes the pots and pans dishwasher-safe. Interior includes three layers of nonstick coating – two layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance. The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop. Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish. Includes 10- and 12-inch omelette pans, 1 1/2- and 2 1/2-quart sauce pans with lids, 3-quart saute pan with lid, 5-quart dutch oven with lid, and 8-quart stock pot with lid. The nonstick surface means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup. Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: Heavy gauge aluminum construction ensures even heating and is hard-anodized for durability. It also makes it dishwasher safe
Interior includes three layers of nonstick coating , two layers provide durability and the third layer offers easy release performance.Utensils: Nylon, Coated or Wood
The long, brushed stainless steel handles are designed to stay cool on the stovetop. Pans and covers are also oven safe, making it ideal for finishing a gourmet dish
Cookware includes 10- and 12-inch omelette pans, 1 1/2- and 2 1/2-quart sauce pans with lids, 3-quart saute pan with lid, 5-quart dutch oven with lid, and 8-quart stock pot with lid
The nonstick surface of the pots and pans means you can cook healthier using less fat, with effortless cleanup. Comes with Calphalon's full lifetime warranty. Note: Cannot be used in Induction Stoves
